text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Know what IS in NC? 8 military bases. Your RNC convention tantrums plus your handling of Russian bounties and all things Covid-19 have doomed your chances here. #runforestrun somewhere else. Thank you Gov Cooper!
